activity.subtitle: We've gathered numerous psychological techniques in one place so you can choose the right one for you!
Each technique has a rating, choose the most effective ones for yourself!

coping.subtitle: Replace destructive beliefs with rational ones using cards

daybook.subtitle: Keep daily records in free form using a convenient editor!
AI will analyze your records, helping you to see the situation from a different perspective

diary.subtitle: Rich functionality for analyzing automatic thoughts and replacing them with more adaptive ones!
The diary contains deep integration with AI to assist in recording and analyzing thoughts
At every step, you will find detailed information on how to properly work with the diary

intermediate.subtitle: Dive deeper into the origins of your experiences to identify your intermediate beliefs.
Add destructive beliefs directly to the coping card and replace them with rational ones.
Intermediate beliefs form the basis of automatic thoughts. Link them for deeper analysis!
